NOTE: it is not clear whether this poses a vulnerability.

data.name: CVE-2002-2397
data.document: Sygate personal firewall 5.0 could allow remote attackers to bypass firewall filters via spoofed (1) source IP address of 127.0.0.1 or (2) network address of 127.0.0.0.

references.name: 20020916 NSSI-2002-sygatepfw5: Sygate Personal Firewall IP Spoofing Vulnerability

data.name: CVE-2002-1258
data.document: Two vulnerabilities in Microsoft Virtual Machine (VM) up to and including build 5.0.3805, as used in Internet Explorer and other applications, allow remote attackers to read files via a Java applet with a spoofed location in the CODEBASE parameter in the APPLET tag, possibly due to a parsing error.

data.name: CVE-2002-1181
data.document: Multiple cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerabilities in the administrative web pages for Microsoft Internet Information Server (IIS) 4.0 through 5.1 allow remote attackers to execute HTML script as other users through (1) a certain ASP file in the IISHELP virtual directory, or (2) possibly other unknown attack vectors.

references.name: 20021105 [SNS Advisory No.58] Microsoft IIS Local Cross-site Scripting Vulnerability

data.name: CVE-2002-1707
data.document: install.php in phpBB 2.0 through 2.0.1, when "allow_url_fopen" and "register_globals" variables are set to "on", allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary PHP code by modifying the phpbb_root_dir parameter to reference a URL on a remote web server that contains the code.

references.name: 20020616 malicious PHP source injection in phpBB

data.name: CVE-2002-1386
data.document: Buffer overflow in traceroute-nanog (aka traceroute-ng) may allow local users to execute arbitrary code via a long hostname argument.

data.name: CVE-2002-1586
data.document: Solaris 2.5.1 through 9 allows local users to cause a denial of service (kernel panic) by setting the sd_struiowrq variable in the struioget function to null, which triggers a null dereference.

data.name: CVE-2002-1859
data.document: Orion Application Server 1.5.3, when running on Windows, allows remote attackers to retrieve files in the WEB-INF directory, which contains Java class files and configuration information, via a request to the WEB-INF directory with a trailing dot ("WEB-INF.").

references.name: 20020628 wp-02-0002: 'WEB-INF' Folder accessible in Multiple Web Application Servers

data.name: CVE-2002-1185
data.document: Internet Explorer 5.01 through 6.0 does not properly check certain parameters of a PNG file when opening it, which allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (crash) by triggering a heap-based buffer overflow using invalid length codes during decompression, aka "Malformed PNG Image File Failure."

references.name: 20021211 PNG (Portable Network Graphics) Deflate Heap Corruption Vulnerability
20021212 PNG (Portable Network Graphics) Deflate Heap Corruption Vulnerability

data.name: CVE-2002-1651
data.document: Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in Verity Search97 allows remote attackers to insert arbitrary web content and steal sensitive information from other clients, possibly due to certain error messages from template pages that use the (1) vformat or (2) vfilter functions.

data.name: CVE-2002-2088
data.document: The MOSIX Project clump/os 5.4 creates a default VNC account without a password, which allows remote attackers to gain root access.

data.name: CVE-2002-1732
data.document: Multiple cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerabilities in Actinic Catalog 4.7.0 allow remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via (1) the query string argument to certain .pl files, (2) the REFPAGE parameter to ca000007.pl, (3) PRODREF parameter to ss000007.pl, or (4) hop parameter to ca000001.pl.

references.name: 20060720 vendor ack/fix: Actinic Catalog Unspecified .pl Files XSS (fwd)

data.name: CVE-2002-1269
data.document: Unknown vulnerability in NetInfo Manager application in Mac OS X 10.2.2 allows local users to access restricted parts of a filesystem.

data.name: CVE-2002-1319
data.document: The Linux kernel 2.4.20 and earlier, and 2.5.x, when running on x86 systems, allows local users to cause a denial of service (hang) via the emulation mode, which does not properly clear TF and NT EFLAGs.

data.name: CVE-2002-1313
data.document: nullmailer 1.00RC5 and earlier allows local users to cause a denial of service via an email to a local user that does not exist, which generates an error that causes nullmailer to stop sending mail to all users.

data.name: CVE-2002-1878
data.document: PHP remote file inclusion vulnerability in w-Agora 4.1.3 allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary PHP code via the inc_dir parameter.

references.name: 20020608 Security holes in LokwaBB and W-Agora

data.name: CVE-2002-1339
data.document: The "XMLURL" property in the Spreadsheet component of Office Web Components (OWC) 10 follows redirections, which allows remote attackers to determine the existence of local files based on exceptions, or to read WorkSheet XML files.

references.name: 20020408 Multiple local files detection issues with OWC in IE (GM#008-IE)

data.name: CVE-2002-1660
data.document: calendar.php in vBulletin before 2.2.0 allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary commands via shell metacharacters in the command parameter.

data.name: CVE-2002-2334
data.document: Joe text editor 2.8 through 2.9.7 does not remove the group and user setuid bits for backup files, which could allow local users to execute arbitrary setuid and setgid root programs when root edits scripts owned by other users.

data.name: CVE-2002-1685
data.document: Cross-site scripting vulnerability (XSS) in BadBlue Enterprise Edition and Personal Edition 1.7 and 1.7.2 allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary script as other users by injecting script into ext.dll ISAPI.

references.name: 20020708 Technical Details of BadBlue EXT.DLL Vulnerability

data.name: CVE-2002-1222
data.document: Buffer overflow in the embedded HTTP server for Cisco Catalyst switches running CatOS 5.4 through 7.3 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (reset) via a long HTTP request.

references.name: 20021016 Cisco CatOS Embedded HTTP Server Buffer Overflow

data.name: CVE-2002-2385
data.document: Buffer overflow in hotfoon4.exe in Hotfoon 4.0 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (crash) and possibly execute arbitrary code via a URL containing a long voice phone number.

data.name: CVE-2002-1279
data.document: Multiple buffer overflows in conf.c for Masqmail 0.1.x before 0.1.17, and 0.2.x before 0.2.15, allow local users to gain privileges via certain entries in the configuration file (-C option).

data.name: CVE-2002-1385
data.document: openwebmail_init in Open WebMail 1.81 and earlier allows local users to execute arbitrary code via .. (dot dot) sequences in a login name, such as the name provided in the sessionid parameter for  openwebmail-abook.pl, which is used to find a configuration file that specifies additional code to be executed.

data.name: CVE-2002-2335

data.name: CVE-2002-1334
data.document: Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in BizDesign ImageFolio 3.01 and earlier allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary web script as other users via (1) the direct parameter in imageFolio.cgi, or (2) nph-build.cgi.

references.name: 20021127 Cross-site Scripting Vulnerability in ImageFolio Image Gallery Software

data.name: CVE-2002-1647
data.document: The quick login feature in Slash Slashcode does not redirect the user to an alternate URL when the wrong password is provided, which makes it easier for remote web sites to guess the proper passwords by reading the username and password from the Referrer URL.

data.name: CVE-2002-1260
data.document: The Java Database Connectivity (JDBC) APIs in Microsoft Virtual Machine (VM) 5.0.3805 and earlier allow remote attackers to bypass security checks and access database contents via an untrusted Java applet.

data.name: CVE-2002-1827

data.name: CVE-2002-1233
data.document: A regression error in the Debian distributions of the apache-ssl package (before 1.3.9 on Debian 2.2, and before 1.3.26 on Debian 3.0), for Apache 1.3.27 and earlier, allows local users to read or modify the Apache password file via a symlink attack on temporary files when the administrator runs (1) htpasswd or (2) htdigest, a re-introduction of a vulnerability that was originally identified and addressed by CVE-2001-0131.

data.name: CVE-2002-1645

data.name: CVE-2002-1267
data.document: Mac OS X 10.2.2 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service by accessing the CUPS Printing Web Administration utility, aka "CUPS Printing Web Administration is Remotely Accessible."

data.name: CVE-2002-2093

references.name: 20021112 [Fwd: Notice of serious vulnerabilities in ISC BIND 4 & 8]
20021112 Multiple Remote Vulnerabilities in BIND4 and BIND8

data.name: CVE-2002-1792

data.name: CVE-2002-1681
data.document:
Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in Slashcode CVS releases June 17 through July 1 2002 allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary script as other users by injecting script into the paragraph

tag.

references.name: 20021112 Multiple Remote Vulnerabilities in BIND4 and BIND8
20021112 [Fwd: Notice of serious vulnerabilities in ISC BIND 4 & 8]

references.name: 20021008 Re: Multiple Vendor PC firewall remote denial of services Vulnerability
20021008 Multiple Vendor PC firewall remote denial of services Vulnerability

data.name: CVE-2002-1861

references.name: 20020628 wp-02-0002: 'WEB-INF' Folder accessible in Multiple Web Application Servers

(dot dot) sequence, or (2) a malformed HTTP GET request with a chunked Transfer-Encoding with missing data.

NOTE: some of these details are obtained from third party information.

20021106 iDEFENSE Security Advisory 11.06.02: Non-Explicit Path Vulnerability in LuxMan
